# Simulated vanilla traditions file
# Load order: 1 (first)

tradition_mountain_homes = {
    category = realm
    
    parameters = {
        mountain_trait_bonuses = yes
    }
    
    province_modifier = {
        defender_advantage = 5
    }
    
    culture_modifier = {
        cultural_acceptance_gain_mult = 0.1
    }
}

tradition_warrior_culture = {
    category = combat
    
    parameters = {
        martial_education_bonus = yes
    }
    
    character_modifier = {
        prowess = 2
        knight_effectiveness_mult = 0.1
    }
}

tradition_seafaring = {
    category = regional
    
    parameters = {
        can_build_longships = yes
    }
    
    province_modifier = {
        embarkation_cost_mult = -0.5
    }
}
